name: Vinmesland
description:
"My journey starts here, although this seems familiar to me"

Embark yourself into the mythical grim cave of Vinmesland.

Save souls from despair, exchange them for power with the fortune teller. 

Find your destination at the end of the cave evading obstacules in the way. 

And remember that a lost soul often looks for another lost soul.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys to steer
  • Mouse click to buy Card Upgrades

Music:

Misery by Damiano Baldoni 

March of Midnight by Scott Buckley
